A lego model designed to look like myself.

 @grid: 1 / 500px; background: @shaders( texture1 { @grid: 1 / 100%; background: linear-gradient( 45deg, @stripe.@m20.@p(#FFF4E0, #F8B501, #06ACB5, #17191D, #FC3D3C) ); } fragment { void main() { vec2 p = gl_FragCoord.xy / u_resolution.xy; vec2 c = vec2(.5, .5); vec2 uv = p.xy - c; float R = 3.141593; float len = length(uv * vec2(u_resolution.x / u_resolution.y, 1.)); float angle = atan(uv.y, uv.x) + R * smoothstep(.75, 0., len); float r = length(uv) + .1; vec2 coords = vec2(r * cos(angle), r * sin(angle)) + c; FragColor = texture(texture1, coords); } } );
